bibl.title: Literary Politics and the Euripidean Vita.
bibl.note: Revised version of a Cambridge MPhil essay presented at the Conference "Why Athens? Reappraising tragic politics", University of Reading, 10-11 September 2007. - [Introduction.] - The Euripidean 'Macedonian question'. - The tendentious tradition. - Ptolemaic literary politics. - Conclusion.
